reviewText: This is an OK workout.  I use parts of it as an add on to the workouts I really love. As a whole it's kind of slow, kind of boring, and the background is just weird. The moves do seem effective. The Quick Fix Stability Ball is a much, much better workout.
summary: I like parts of this workout.
Title: The Method - The Stability Ball Workout

reviewText: This is not a good routine. Boring and doesn't really flow. You would definetly do better with with Quick Fix Stability Ball Workout or Karen Voights Ball workout.Check my other review on Amazon for the best choices in exercise and yoga DVDs. Thanks!
summary: Not a good one, try another
Title: The Method - The Stability Ball Workout

reviewText: There wasn't any aspect of this dvd I didn't enjoy. The instruction is well cued, easy to follow and the instructor is friendly and easy to listen to,great scenerey too!  I think the workout is challenging enough and very muscle specific if you concentrate on proper form. I enjoyed it so much that I bought it as a VHS b4 it came on amazon then when I saw it here I bought the DVD.
summary: One of My Favourite Stability ball Workouts!
Title: The Method - The Stability Ball Workout

reviewText: the instructor in this video did not seem real confident in the moves, and was not very assertive. This ab routine is lacking inmany ways, and the ball routine was very plain. I'd recomment ON THE BALL ABS with LEISA HART, it is much better and more informative.
summary: poor instruction, other ab tapes are better
Title: The Method - The Stability Ball Workout

reviewText: I did not like it, maybe the ball thing isn't for me. Too hard on my shoulders and elbow
Title: The Method - The Stability Ball Workout
